content: व्याजः {@--1@} Deceit, trick, deception. fraud. {@--2@} Art, cunning; अव्याजमनोहरं वपुः <ls>Ś. 1. 18</ls> ‘artlessly lovely.’ {@--3@} A pretext, pretence, semblance; ध्यानव्याजमुपेत्य <ls>Nāg. 1. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 4. 25</ls>, <ls n="R. 4.">58</ls>; <ls n="R.">10. 76</ls>; <ls n="R.">11. 66.</ls> {@--4@} An artifice, a device, contrivance; व्याजार्धसंदर्शितमेखलानि <ls>R. 13. 42.</ls> {@--5@} Wickedness, depravity.
